LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_WildAnimalsDescription: Spawns the extinct animals in the wild.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_WildPlantsDescription: Spawns the extinct plants in the wild.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_RandomResourceToNullDescr: If a fossil or DNA has nothing assigned to it (for example, a mod was removed mid-game), assign a random one. This will avoid missing textures and useless resources, but means you may get resources you never had before.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_UIConsiderStockpiledDescr: The UI for bill configuration only accounts for resources in stockpiles, just like the UI for vanilla recipes. Disabling this makes the UI count the items in the entire map, which may lead to lower performance.
LanguageData.Pangaea_MissingResourceDescription: The pawn this resource belonged to was probably removed from your game. Sorry D:
LanguageData.Pangaea_AnimalTypeExplanation: The Pangaea category this animal fits into.
LanguageData.Pangaea_ExtinctionStatusExplanation: The extinction status of this organism.
